text: How is the hs-search-results__description determined for search results? Seems very random to me and would like to have more control on what gets pulled. Some descriptions are a few sentences long and others are a few words...
I was looking at improving how these snippets get generated
Is there a way to prioritize Landing Pages before Website Pages? I know I can select to include different page types, but wasn’t sure about priority.
Also, what kind of analytics are available and how do we access that?
I think Analytics for search are coming down the road, there’s no dashboard yet
I do think it’s tracking the data right now though
You can do rudimentary analytics using custom events in HubSpot or GA
Good point, will look into that for the time being.
